feed.title: Dagu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 6cd013e81cf814e0f4356dc85050fd40cef8b38a [#821] Support Snapcraft distribution (#824)

Summary

  • Bugfixes (#796 #799 #810)
  • Support /health endpoint
  • Support headless mode
  • Enhance YAML Editor with field completion and schema validation

What's Changed

  • support for headless mode as mentioned in #800 by @kriyanshii in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/805
  • chore: Update docker examples (Fixes #638) by @arky in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/818
  • chore: Email attachment testcase (Fixes #812) by @arky in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/814
  • [#820] Add /health endpoint for health check by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/823
  • digraph: update node.go by @eltociear in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/788

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/788
  • @kennethpjdyer made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/791
  • @arky made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/808
  • @vhespanha made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/659

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.0...v1.16.1

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.2
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 28105028cda8cca147a8e8b8c30d642bbc982787 [#830] executor/docker: support network configuration (#835)

What's Changed

  • system version fix by @dayne in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/829
  • [#827] executor/docker: Fix: command arguments are not evaluated by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/832
  • [#831] cmd: fix: --config parameter handling by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/834
  • [#830] executor/docker: support network configuration by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/835

New Contributors

  • @dayne made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/829
  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/833

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.1...v1.16.2

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.3
entry.content:
Changelog

  • ec38f7e5a3e51cc585e9419cf2cfa2f2c1476f09 [#840] config: fix: Add dagsDir config key (#850)

What's Changed

  • doc(executor/docker): add doc about working with env by @vnghia in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/836
  • doc: Add Github sponser button by @arky in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/839
  • doc: Update code of conduct by @arky in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/843
  • doc: improve contribution guide, add commit standards by @arky in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/844
  • [#846] Fix: issue in calling sub-DAG by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/848
  • [#847] fix: digraph: overload multiple dotenv files by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/849
  • [#840] config: fix: Add dagsDir config key by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/850

New Contributors

  • @vnghia made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/836

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.2...v1.16.3

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.4
entry.content:
Changelog

  • e1b639a06e485903c4be6496aed639c5176ab992 ci: fix: goreleaser config

What's Changed

  • docs: update quickstart to include messy output example by @Lewiscowles1986 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/851
  • [#854] config: fix: BasePath config is not working by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/860
  • docs: note block in execute the DAG of QuickStart by @Lewiscowles1986 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/862
  • [#861] test: add: integration test for logDir configuration by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/864

New Contributors

  • @Lewiscowles1986 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/851

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.3...v1.16.4

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.5
entry.content:
Changelog

  • f0578849351b808eb353d2d7c8f58e1eb8148366 executor/mail: fix: line breaks in email body are not properly converted to <br /> (#888)

What's Changed

  • docs: bump python version for docs to 3.11.9 by @Lewiscowles1986 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/865
  • chore: add CHANGELOG.md by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/866
  • fix: snapshot deprecated warning (Fixes #869) by @arky in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/870
  • docs: fixed incorrect command syntax in slack notification example by @david-waterworth in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/874
  • [#877] ui: fix: base path is not working on web by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/878
  • [#882] Fix context handling issue by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/883
  • [#880] config: fix: auth token issue by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/884
  • executor/mail: fix: line breaks in email body are not properly converted to <br /> by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/888

New Contributors

  • @david-waterworth made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/874

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.4...v1.16.5
